---
title: "Requirements"
---

To start this lab, you'll need the following environments:

:::{.callout-important}
Visit the "[Programming Toolkit-webpage](https://kirenz.github.io/lab-toolkit/)" to learn how to meet all requirements.
:::

- **Python**: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment `langchain` and Visual Studio Code
- **Environment**: Use this folder template: [*langchain-intro*](https://github.com/kirenz/lab-langchain-intro/blob/main/langchain-intro.zip) and insert your OpenAI API key in the `.env` file.
